items.content_html: webfunny是一款轻量级的前端监控系统，webfunny也是一款前端性能监控系统，无埋点监控前端日志，实时分析前端健康状态。webfunny is a lightweight front-end monitoring system and webfunny is also a front-end performance monitoring system. It monitors front-end logs and analyzes front-end health status in real time.
items.title: a597873885/webfunny_monitor: webfunny是一款轻量级的前端监控系统，webfunny也是一款前端性能监控系统，无埋点监控前端日志，实时分析前端健康状态。webfunny is a lightweight front-end monitoring system and webfunny is also a front-end performance monitoring system. It monitors front-end logs and analyzes front-end health status in real time.
